Package org.consensusj.jsonrpc

Class AbstractRpcClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.consensusj.jsonrpc.AbstractRpcClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, AsyncSupport, JacksonRpcClient, JsonRpcClient
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RpcClient
    public abstract class AbstractRpcClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonRpcClient, JacksonRpcClient
    Abstract Base class for a strongly-typed JSON-RPC client. This abstract class handles the use of Jackson to map from JSON to Java Objects, but leaves the core sendRequestForResponse method as abstract to be implemented by subclasses allowing implementation with alternative HTTP client libraries. Note: We may be able to pull more or all of this functionality into JacksonRpcClient

      • sendRequestForResponse

        public abstract <R> JsonRpcResponse<R> sendRequestForResponse​(JsonRpcRequest request,
                                                              JavaType responseType)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                                              JsonRpcStatusException
        Subclasses must implement this method to actually send the request
        Type Parameters:
        R - Type of result object
        Parameters:
        request - The request to send
        responseType - The response to expected (used by Jackson for conversion)
        Returns:
        A JSON RPC Response with `result` of type `R`
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - network error
        JsonRpcStatusException - JSON RPC status error

      • send

        public <R> R send​(java.lang.String method,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.Object> params)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  JsonRpcStatusException
        Call an RPC method and return default object type. Caller should cast returned object to the correct type. Useful for: * Dynamically-dispatched JSON-RPC methods calls via Groovy subclasses * Simple (not client-side validated) command line utilities * Functional tests that need to send incorrect types to the server to test error handling
        Specified by:
        send in interface JsonRpcClient
        Type Parameters:
        R - Type of result object
        Parameters:
        method - JSON RPC method call to send
        params - JSON RPC parameters as a `List`
        Returns:
        the 'response.result' field of the JSON RPC response cast to type R
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - network error
        JsonRpcStatusException - JSON RPC status error
